Change log
============

0.0.8 (17/05/2022)
---------------------
- First release

0.0.9 (19/05/2022)
---------------------
- Implemented converting "behave" report into "cucumber"

0.1.0 (20/05/2022)
---------------------
- Added tool implementation solution description into README.md
- Refactored behave_to_cucumber_converter.py

0.1.1 (23/05/2022)
---------------------
- Upgraded requests version
- Refactoring

0.1.2 (23/05/2022)
---------------------
- Moved *.json into model folder
- Replaced setup.cfg with pyproject.toml

0.1.3 (23/05/2022)
---------------------
- Refactoring

0.1.4 (23/05/2022)
---------------------
- Added urls to pyproject.toml
- Added environment variables config info to README.md

0.1.5 (23/05/2022)
---------------------
- Added project.urls to pyproject.toml

0.1.6 (23/05/2022)
---------------------
- Refactoring

0.1.7 (22/07/2022)
---------------------
- Made report schema validation only for "cucumber" and "behave" formats

0.1.8 (22/07/2022)
---------------------
- Changed API_KEY environment variable to ZEPHYR_TOKEN

0.1.9 (25/07/2022)
---------------------
- Changed provision of Zephyr Scale API Access Token
